name: dendriform
description: A web based offline first outliner with sync

scripts.bundle: npx esbuild --bundle --sourcemap --target=es2018 --outdir=dist --format=esm --minify --splitting src/ts/tree.ts src/example/main.ts && cp src/css/*.css dist/example && cp src/example/index2.html dist/example/index.html
scripts.run-integration-tests: npm run bundle-integration-tests && TIZZY_ITEST_RELATIVE_FILENAME=test/integration/integration-tests.html npx ts-node lib/run-integration-tests.ts
scripts.test: npm run unit-tests && npm run run-integration-tests
scripts.bt: npm run compile && npm run bundle && npm run test
scripts.cbt: npm run clean && npm run bt
scripts.dependency-graph: npx depcruise --include-only "^src" --do-not-follow "(tree.ts|main.ts)" --output-type dot src | dot -T svg > dependencygraph.svg

author: Boris Terzic <boris@terzic.be>
